step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm extended overhead. Remember to feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Keep your palm and fingers open wide as instructed.
Great work opening your hand wide. Focus on relaxing your muscles during this phase.
You made a strong fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid movement.
Second rep, starting strong! Ensure your arm is straight overhead and you feel the resistance.
Nicely done opening your hand wide. Remember to relax your muscles here.
Good job opening your hand wide. Keep that relaxed feeling as you prepare for the next step.
Excellent fist and muscle tightening on the inhale. You're effectively pumping the lymph fluid!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make a tight fist while inhaling, then open your hand wide while exhaling to help move lymph fluid.
